text: A Static Surveillance Team attached to the Srirangam assembly constituency seized 130 copper pots and 50 copper lamps from a vehicle here in the early hours on Sunday. It was checking vehicles as per the model code of conduct when it stopped a vehicle on Kumbakonathan Salai and found copper items inside the vehicle without proper documents. Balamurugan from Kumbakonam was carrying the goods to Tiruppur. The goods were confiscated and deposited at the treasury finally.
title: Copper pots and lamps seized
